page.title: 10HOME LIFE: SPAR SHOP ROOKLEY
page.content: Mrs.Lord, the Assistant Manager of the Spar Shop, lives in Newport. She has 2 children, both girls. Mrs.Lord likes the area because it is friendly, and near to most schools. The shop gets a lot of trade from tourists and campers who go into Rookley Country Park and cross the road to buy food and drink. Although it is called {"Spar" }the shop is really a farm shop. One of the regular customers of the{"Spar" }is Mrs. Ainsley who lives just around the corner with her invalid husband. She has 2 children both of whom are married; one living on the Island and one in Africa. Mrs. Ainsley has lived in Rookley for 16 years and at one time worked as a nurse at Whitecroft Psychiatric Hospital.
